reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater beautiful, with one noting it's perfect for transitioning from winter to spring, and appreciate its awesome quality and thickness. They describe it as soft, comfortable, and flattering, with one mentioning it's flattering for any body type. The size receives mixed feedback - while some say it's true to size, others note it runs a little big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and soft
items.body: Soft and TTS. Cute alone or under a cardigan/suit coat Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buttery Soft Sweater
items.body: This sweater is a must for fall! It's buttery soft, medium thickness, and the color is so pretty. The sleeves give it that feminine touch. It does run a little big. If you are in between sizes I would recommend sizing down. One of my favorite clothing purchases from Amazon. Read more
items.author: LibbyT

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs large and Color not as Bright
items.body: I got this sweater in the baby blue. My size is usually a S or M depending on the top. Since a M per their size chart is a 37" bust, I ordered the M. The sweater must run on the large side as it was too big on me. So I returned it and got the Small and it fit great. I love the blue color in the picture, but unfortunately, the actual color is not that bright. It is a lot more muted and I attached a picture so you can see. However, the sweater is very soft, is very stretchy and well made. I find the material to be of medium weight and of high quality. After running it through a rinse cycle, it came out beautiful, with no wrinkles and did not shrink. Even though I took off a star, it is only because of the sizing. Other than that, I am very pleased with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Julaine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Insanely flattering & soft!
items.body: I love this sweater so much. It is incredible quality, thick and soft and hugs your body like a comfy blanket. The green is absolutely stunning. Also got it in v-neck in the pink. Just beautiful for transition from winter to spring! Read more
items.author: Aimee

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, But it Runs Small and Pills Very Easily
items.body: Cute, but it runs small and pills very easily. I returned after wearing once for a few hours because it already looked very worn out. Not the best quality Read more
items.author: Wendi Dougherty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft
items.body: These sweaters (I bought all 3 necklines to try) are so soft and comfy. This has a great neckline and sits nicely on my chest without being too revealing. The color is beautiful and the other one washed and dried well. (I haven't laundered this one yet, but will do it on delicate in a garment bag) All the wrinkles came out after washing. Read more
items.author: Big time shopper

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Arrived damaged and half inside out
items.body: I had high hopes for these shirts as my sister had purchased several last year and they looked great on her. Not sure what happened in the manufacturing and shipping over the last year but this product arrived damaged from vacuum sealing, with distinct and unrepairable lines down the front of the shirts. One of the shirts also arrived in a loose bag and looked like it had been tried on and shoved in the bag, half inside out. Will be returning all of them Read more
items.author: kristina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality!
items.body: Love the way it fits and looks. Very good quality and I would definitely buy again. Read more
items.author: Gregory P.

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Baby Blue, Leaf Green, Navy, Pure Black, Wine Red, Pink, Cream, Army Green, Bright White, Light Beige, Purple&pink, Brick Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
